ARABIC: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah shows favour to mankind but most of them are not thankful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily your Lord is gracious to men, though most men are ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed Your Lord is exceedingly bountiful to mankind. Yet most of them do not give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord has many favors for mankind but most of them are ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed your Lord is Most Munificent upon mankind, but most men do not give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, your Lord is full of grace for mankind, yet most of them do not give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And surely your Lord is the Lord of grace to men, but most of them are not grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely thy Lord is bountiful to men; but most of them are not thankful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thy Lord is full of bounty for mankind, but most of them do not give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truly, your Lord is bountiful to mankind, but most of them are not grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily thine Lord is full of grace for mankind, but most of them give not thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed your Lord is gracious to mankind, but most of them do not give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But verily thy Lord is full of grace to mankind: Yet most of them are ungrateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, your Lord is full of Grace for mankind, yet most of them do not give thanks."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, your Lord is bountiful to the people; yet most of them do not give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your Lord is gracious towards humanity, but most of them are not thankful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, your Lord is full of bounty for the people, but most of them do not show gratitude."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:73] And surely your Lord is bountiful to mankind, an example of which is His deferring chastisement for the disbelievers, but most of them are not thankful — disbelievers are not grateful for the deferring of chastisement since they reject [the fact] that it will ever come to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thy Lord) Muhammad (is full of bounty for mankind) for deferring His punishment, (but most of them do not give thanks) for the deferment of punishment.
